title: Pirelli F1 - Show vs Sport in Racing - Tommy Kendall on /SHAKEDOWN - TrackDown
description: It's SRT Viper racer Tommy Kendall's turn on TrackDown on /ShakeDown with Leo Parente. The topics are Pirelli Tire issues in F1, Is racing better as a 'Show' or a "Sport', 2013 Le Mans 24 debrief for Viper, ALMS / Grand-Am / USCR consolidation vs WEC, and Where SpeedTV is going [Away! Leaving /ShakeDown /DRIVE as your only auto racing info-programming choice].
